document.title: SP418-E-Healthy Children_3 Months Old

author.organization: The University of Tennessee Agricultural Extension Service

document.abstract: Your baby doesn’t use words yet, but he will understand a universal language — body language. This is a language that doesn’t need words. You can tell your baby you love him by giving him a hug, singing a song or gently rocking him to music. You will find that he talks back to you in the same way. He will give you a smile, a giggle, a coo or a hearty chuckle.
